2025-02-12期



东南亚服冒险岛公告


v239 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 12th February, 1118hrs)


05 Feb 2025

v239 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 12th February, 1118hrs)




Dear Maplers,
Please refer to the update notice for information regarding each patch's issues and updates.

Last Update: 12th February 2025, 1118hrs



Important Notice


6th February 2025, 1245hrs


  • A temporary fix has been deployed to the issue where Kinesis tutorial cannot be proceeded due to Level 100 monsters are being summoned.
    •  ↪ It has been modified to only 3 monsters with the defeatable HP will be summoned during the tutorial and upon defeated 1 of the monsters, the mission will be completed.
     ↪ Relevant quest item will be provided upon entering the specific map. If there is no empty ETC slots, please empty 1 ETC slot to proceed.

    5th February 2025, 1435hrs



  • New Name Auction can now be accessed by talking to NPC Mister New Name in Henesys. Unclaimed name or Maple Points can be received until 11th March 2025, 2359hrs.



    • Current Known Issues


    Thank you to Maplers who reported issue(s) listed below.

    12th February 2025


  • An issue where the character position on Black Bean Chair appears lower than intended is being investigated.
  • An issue where a certain Twilight Perion monster's name contains inconsistency is being investigated.
  • An issue where King Omen's monster name contains text error is being investigated.
  • An issue where Chicky Spring Chair does not have special effects when 2 players are sitting side by side is being investigated.
  • An issue where certain Root Abyss themed accessories item name contains text error is being investigated.
  • An issue where a certain Temple of Time monster's name contains inconsistency is being investigated.

    • 6th February 2025


  • An issue where performing Alt+Tab action while using any fullscreen resolution sometimes would cause the game client to behave abnormally is being investigated.



    • Resolved Issues


    12th February 2025 Minor Patch


  • Fixed an issue where the strikethrough formatting in Cash Shop appears abnormal.
  • Fixed an issue where the Genesis Fan luck item effect behaves abnormally when the secondary weapon slot is equipped with Absolabs Incarnadine.
  • Fixed an issue where Kanna's Phantom Yaksha: Big Boss cannot be moved after registered as a hotkey.
  • Fixed an issue where the guidance text in Skin Prism UI appears awkward.
  • Fixed an issue where Boss of Darkness Accessory Shard's item tooltip contains text error.
  • Fixed an issue where where certain pop up warning in V Matrix Slot Enhancement contains text error.
  • Fixed an issue where where Damage Skin - Heavy Impact's tooltip in Damage Skin Inventory appears abnormal.
  • Fixed an issue where certain monster's name contains inconsistency.

    • 6th February 2025 Hot Fixes


  • Fixed an issue where Karma Regular Cube obtained from Karma Regular Cube Lucky Eight Package has a duration of 7 days.
    •  ↪ Maplers whom previously obtained Karma Regular Cube that has a duration of 7 days may perform a relog to refresh the item's duration to 30 days.
  • Fixed an issue where Blair Salon Neptune Hair Coupon (M) and Blair Salon Saturn Hair Coupon (F) cannot be used on android.

    • 5th February 2025 Hot Fixes


  • Fixed an issue where EXP Coupon obtained from CHASER Special Investigation before v239 could not be used.
  • Cross World PQ service has resumed as of 1617hrs.



    • - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    [Completed] Minor Patch on 12th February 2025


    11 Feb 2025

    [Completed] Minor Patch on 12th February 2025


    Dear Maplers,

    Please be informed that there will be a scheduled Minor Patch maintenance on 12th February 2025.
    During this period, services undergoing maintenance will be temporarily unavailable.

    Game Maintenance
  • Maintenance Period: 12th February 2025, 0800hrs ~ 1114hrs 1200hrs (GMT+8)
  • Affected Service(s): MapleStorySEA game servers
  • Impact: All MapleStorySEA game servers will be unavailable
    •   ↪ Game services for all worlds will not be available during the stipulated time. Kindly log out before this period to avoid disruptions to your gameplay.

    Minor Patch


  • Game Client Version: v239.2
  • Size: ~147 MB
  • A Minor Patch has been included in this maintenance.
  • You are recommended to launch your Game Client to run the Auto Patcher.

    • Update Preview
  • Cash Shop Update details for 12th February 2025 can be found here.

    • Important Notice & Known Issues
  • List of important notices, known issues, issues scheduled to be fixed and fixed issues can be found here.

    • Thank you.

    - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    国际服冒险岛公告


    v.257 - Tallahart: Grave of the Gods Patch Notes


    The new region of Tallahart has been discovered, opening up vast lands for exploration! Team up with Roan and unlock exciting features for your customizable chair through Tirnog Hashtag. Are you ready for the challenge? Test your skills against a new boss each week in the Champion Burning Challenge to earn valuable rewards, and don't forget to take advantage of the weekly perks offered through Sunny Sunday. Finally, join forces to help Pink Bean achieve the prestigious Space Star Pink Bean title and earn even more rewards!

    TABLE OF CONTENTS

    v.257 - Tallahart: Grave of the Gods is coming soon on February 12th!

    • New Updates
      • Tallahart
      • Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes
        • Common
        • Job
      • Other Improvements and Bug Fixes
        • Monster
        • Map
        • UI
        • Quest
        • Item
        • NPC
        • Cash Shop
      • Monster Collection Updates
    • Burning Events
      • Champion Burning Double Up
        • Champion Burning Double Up Coin Shop
      • Champion Burning Challenge
        • Champion Burning Challenge Coin Shop
      • Burning World Leap
    • Extradimensional Visitors Events
      • Extradimensional Visitors
      • Tirnog Hashtag
      • Blueprints for Tirnog
      • Gob's Gift
      • Tyrobot Playground
      • Dimensional Spring Exchange
      • Tirnog Meso Shop
    • Other Events
      • Space Star Pink Bean
      • Sunny Sunday

    NEW UPDATES

    Tallahart

    Requirement: Lv. 290 and above characters who have completed the 5th Job Advancement and the '[Carcion] The Eternal Tree's Guardian' quest.

    Journey into the newly discovered region of Tallahart, one of the major regions in Continental Grandis. Join forces with the Primacy and claim the power of the dormant gods sealed within the city!

    • Accept the '[Tallahart] On the Move Again' quest from the light bulb notifier on the left side of the screen to begin the start of your journey in the Tallahart region.
    • Explore the Tallahart region and complete the following new quests:
      • [Tallahart] On the Move Again
      • [Tallahart] Carlisle's Clue
      • [Tallahart] Word Around the Saloon
      • [Tallahart] The Grave of the Gods
      • [Tallahart] Squall in the Wastes
      • [Tallahart] The City is Risen
      • [Tallahart] Wrath of the Gods
      • [Tallahart] Into the Breach 1
      • [Tallahart] Into the Breach 2
      • [Tallahart] The Great Bridge
      • [Tallahart] Toward the First Seal 1
      • [Tallahart] Toward the First Seal 2
      • [Tallahart] The Gods' Illusions
      • [Tallahart] Toward the Second Seal
      • [Tallahart] Suspicious Energy
      • [Tallahart] The Second Seal
      • [Tallahart] Mystery of the Illusions
      • [Tallahart] The Unseen Enemy
      • [Tallahart] The Third Seal
      • [Tallahart] The Sacred Treasure
      • [Tallahart] The Final Seal
      • [Tallahart] Toward the Illusion Temple
      • [Tallahart] The Decisive Battle
      • [Tallahart] Our Destined Roles
      • [Tallahart] The Battle to Come
    • Added the following maps to the Tallahart region:
      • Grave of the Gods
      • Ruins
      • Bridge to the City
      • Altar of Providence
      • Altar of Judgement
      • Altar of Eternity
      • Sanctum Gate
      • Patch to the Sanctum
      • Phantasmal Night Sanctum
      • Silent Ashlands 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
      • Fate-Fields of Providence 1, 2, 3
      • Fate-Fields of Judgment 1, 2, 3
      • Fate-Fields of Eternity 1, 2, 3
      • Night Road 1, 2, 3, 4
      • Phantasmal Road 1, 2, 3 , 4

    • Added the following NPCs to the Tallahart region:
      • Phantasmal Priest
      • Night Knight
      • Nona
      • Sieg
      • Prague
      • Nameless Soul
    • Added the following monsters to the Tallahart region:
    Tallahart Monsters
    Ash-Devouring Soul Silence-Swallowing Soul Judge of Storms Executor of Eternity
    Night Guide Phantasmal Guide Soul Slayer Lost Soul

    Soul of Darkness (Elite Boss)
    • Added a Grand Sacred Symbol to the Tallahart region.
      • Complete the Tallahart region quests to receive one Grand Sacred Symbol: Tallahart.
      • Grand Sacred Symbols can be upgraded to Lv. 11, with each level granting +10 Sacred Power.
        • At Lv. 1 the symbol grants 10% Bonus EXP, 5% Mesos Obtained, and 5% Item Drop Rate, increasing to 50% Bonus EXP, 15% Mesos Obtained, and 15% Item Drop Rate at Lv. 11.
      • Sacred Catalyst cannot be used on Grand Sacred Symbols.
      • Grand Sacred Symbols cannot be obtained from Sacred Symbol Selector Coupons.

    • Added Tallahart to the Symbol Express Pass.
      • After completing the Tallahart region quests, spend 900 Maple Points to instantly complete the Tallahart Daily Quest.
    • Added a medal that can be obtained in the Tallahart region.
      • Destiny's Adversary: Untradable, Permanent

    Back to Top

    Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    Common Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Improvement made so Decent Holy Fountain’s action delay is now affected by Attack Speed.
    • Improvement made so Decent Holy Fountain no longer uses a charge when activated while recovery isn't possible.
    • Resolved an issue where the effect on/off feature would sometimes not work for the following skills:
      • Aran - Blizzard Tempest
      • Demon Slayer - Blue Blood
    • Resolved an issue of the on/off feature working even if the skill level was 0 in the Hyper Skill UI and in some class skill's UI.
    • Resolved an issue of buff icons not appearing when some summoner skills used Giant Potion, Advanced Giant Potion, and Giants' Potion. The following skills have been fixed:
    Job Skill

    Job Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Dark Knight
      • Resolved an issue where the effect and skill sound effects of some skills did not appear for some players. Fixes have been made to the skills below:
        • Evil Eye Shock
        • Evil Eye of Domination
        • Evil Eye Shock II
        • Evil Eye Shock III
        • Revenge of the Evil Eye
    • Bishop
      • Holy Fountain
        • Improvement made so Holy Fountain’s action delay is now affected by Attack Speed.
        • Improvement made so Holy Fountain no longer uses a charge when activated while recovery isn't possible.
        • Resolved an issue where using Holy Fountain would sometimes summon multiple Holy Fountains.
    • Dual Blade
      • Karma Blade
        • Increased the additional attack damage at Lv. 30 from 1071% to 1224%.
        • Decreased the additional attack attack count from 8 to 7 times.
      • Improvement made where the Flash Jump will not use Dual Blade’s Recruit’s Agility if the up arrow key is used.
    • Demon Slayer
      • Resolved an issue where Demon Slayer's HEXA Demon Impact: Demon Chain's attack power reduction effect would not be applied.
    • All Explorer Magicians
      • Mind Delve
        • Resolved an issue where the skill could be used again before its cooldown ended.
        • Resolved an issue where using Mind Delve could cancel the animation of other skills.
    • Kain
      • Shadow Step
        • Resolved an issue where Shadow Step did not stealth from falling debris.
      • Mind Break
        • Updated the skill description.
    • Zero
      • Improvement made where if moving up isn't possible, Burst Jump will activate in the direction the character is currently moving.
      • Resolved an issue where Zero's Ego Weapon's Alpha skill icon would occasionally display awkwardly.
      • Resolved an issue where the description for Shadow Flash was unclear.
      • Resolved an issue where Zero attacks skills did not combo when using a controller.
    • Kanna
      • Hakumenkonmou Juubi
        • Resolved an issue where Hakumenkonmou Juubi's Mana consumption functionality interacted oddly with Bellflower Barrier.
    • Pathfinder
      • Bountiful Burst
        • Resolved an issue where Pathfinder’s Bountiful Burst was not applying damage.
        • Resolved an issue where Bountiful Burst did not trigger when casting Cardinal Deluge with a macro.
    • Corsair
      • Resolved an issue where Firing Orders set to auto did not summon or summoned in awkward areas.
      • Resolved an issue where the attack would not continue when HEXA Rapid Fire shootout mode ends in the air.
    • Blaze Wizard
      • Blazing Extinction Fox Mode & HEXA Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
        • Added so that Savage Flame charges can be obtained when using the Blazing Extinction/HEXA Blazing Extinction skill.
      • Orbital Explosion
        • Orbital Explosion now deals an additional hit when Eternity hits.
        • Resolved an issue where the additional hit of Orbital Explosion would not occur in the air.
        • Resolved an issue where the additional hit of Orbital Explosion would not occur when Inferno Sphere hits.
      • Savage Flame Lion Mode
        • Resolved an issue where the skill SFX would sometimes not end.
        • Resolved an issue where the buff icon would sometimes be removed even while the skill is active.
      • Flashfire
        • Resolved an issue where Flashfire would disappear upon death but the effect still persists.
      • Resolved an issue with Flame Elemental not being summoned when using the following skills:
        • Blazing Extinction Lion Mode
        • Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
        • Savage Flame Lion Mode
        • Savage Flame Fox Mode
        • HEXA Blaming Extinction Lion Mode
        • HEXA Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
      • Resolved an issue where Salamander Mischief did not attack when using the following skills:
        • Blazing Extinction Lion Mode
        • Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
        • HEXA Blazing Extinction Lion Mode
        • HEXA Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
    • Lara
      • Dragon Vein Absorption can now be used once an Absorption skill reaches Lv. 1.
    • Hoyoung
      • Resolved an issue where the hidden state would be removed when Graceful Flight is used in the upward direction.
      • Resolved an issue where some decoration items and Hoyoung's ears not changing to black and white when Sage: Dream of Shangri-La is used.
    • Shade
      • Spirit Claw
        • Adjusted casting motion.
      • Soul Splitter
        • Decreased action delay by approximately 27%
        • Improvements made to create flames in the location of the enemy with the Blade Imp - Trap mark within a certain range if the hit fails.
        • Improvements made to create flames in the air if there are no platforms nearby.
      • Fox God Flash
        • Decreased foxlight activation interval by approximately 60%.
      • HEXA Spirit Claw
        • Adjusted casting motion.

    Back to Top

    Other Improvements and Bug Fixes

    Monster Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • The HP of the following bosses has decreased by approximately 11%:
      • Chosen Seren (Extreme)
      • Kalos the Guardian (Chaos, Extreme)
      • Kaling (Hard, Extreme)
      • Limbo (Hard)
    • Chosen Seren (Extreme)
      • Increased death count from 5 to 8.
      • Decreased Stun duration of Phase 1 Sun Sword Energy by 50%.
      • Decreased the maximum number of Avatar of Nerota that can be summoned in Phase 2 from 4 to 3.
    • Kalos the Guardian
      • Revive location after death in Phase 2 has changed.
      • Decreased Phase 2 Guardian’s Infultration number of attacks from 3 to 1.
      • Decreased Phase 2 Eye of the Abyss attack range by around 76%.
      • Increased the Death Count of Chaos and Extreme Mode from 5 to 8.
    • Resolved an issue where the skill effect hidden in the Tynos summon cutscene would sometimes not be displayed again.
    • Resolved an issue where the following boss reward boxes were able to move sideways based on character location after being hit:
      • Pierre (Normal, Chaos)
      • Crimson Queen (Normal, Chaos)
      • Black Mage (Hard, Extreme)
    • Resolved an issue where the client would sometimes close when monsters are defeated by some skills in Epic Dungeon.
    • Resolved an issue where Zeal of Blasphemy in High Mountain was not counting towards the stage progress.
    • Resolved an issue where Tin Woodsman was incorrectly named and should be Tin Woodman instead.
    • Resolved an issue where Masterian Elite mobs and Field Bosses did not spawn in Phantom Forest and Crimsonwood Keep maps.

    Map Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Changed the Rune Appearance Cooldown in fields other than Sacred Power Fields to have the same 15 min cooldown timer.
    • Improvement was made so if "Do not go together" is selected when attempting to enter the Inferno Wolf portal and you see all of Pollo's dialogue, Inferno Wolf's portal is removed.
    • Fixed mini-map visibility in Magatia’s Dark Lab.
    • Resolved an issue where the charge amount needed to enter the restricted area in Epic Dungeon: Angler Company Stage 4 and 7 displayed in the Angler Proto-Suit tooltip is 1,000.
    • Resolved an issue where some platform images of the ‘Eye of the Ishfira’ map looked awkward.

    UI Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Changed the text when reseting abilities with a Miracle Circulator from 'Save' to 'Reset'.
    • Changed the combat status guide method from a pop-up to system message.
    • Changed the tooltip location to appear at the center of the game screen when hovering over a chat link in an external chat window.
    • Changed to disable the Cash Shop shortcut key when the Guild UI is open.
    • Changed the Buff Favorites UI to now display the same number of buff icons as the number of Shadower's Smokescreen and Battle Mage's Party Shield used.
    • Improvement was made so if the Legion UI is opened, Legion Coins can always be claimed regardless of where you're currently located.
    • Improved the Soul Collector UI:
      • Added arrows to move through pages.
      • Improvement was made to be able to return to the previous Soul Collector UI through the bookmark button.
      • Improvement was made so it's possible to move pages left and right in the Soul Collector UI by scrolling with the mouse.
    • Resolved an issue where sound effects did not work when Spell Trace and Transfer Hammer were transferred.
    • Resolved an issue where some buttons in the character selection window were displayed awkwardly.
    • Resolved an issue where the Job Progression click range was sometimes incorrect in the character selection window.
    • Resolved an issue where there were text errors in the Special Nodes and Artifact Tool guide.
    • Resolved an issue where Equipment items' Star Force and Scroll Enhancement figures were not being displayed separately in the Cash Shop.
    • Resolved an issue where you could not see Soul skill info in the Soul Collector UI when you checked the skills of bosses that have two Soul skills and when you moved the boss with one Soul skill to a tab.
    • Resolved an issue where the Soul Collector UI displayed only one of two Soul skill icons. It will now display both.
    • Resolved an issue where the Close button did not work when the Enter key was pressed repeatedly in the results window that appears when you use Wisp’s Wondrous Wonderberry item.
    • Resolved an issue where the notification window sometimes appeared in an awkward location when the screen resolution was changed.
    • Resolved an issue where the Equipment Tooltip Combat Power Increase was displayed without the Tanadian Ruin Skill and Demon Avenger's Star Force Conversion effect reflected.
    • Resolved an issue where pet set effects were not reflected in the ATT Stats and Combat Power Increase displayed in the Equipment tooltip when you used Maple Auction after equipping a pet with pet set effects.
    • Resolved an issue where the Combat Power Increase displayed in the tooltip was awkward when comparing weapons with different weapon constants of weapons that can be equipped by the character.
    • Resolved an issue where the mouse cursor moved awkwardly when the countdown screen effect occurred after entering the Sharenian Culvert.
    • Resolved an issue where you could not see the dialogue window in some story cutscenes.
    • Resolved an error where the character's Tower of Oz Weekly Ranking record sometimes did not renew.
    • Resolved an issue where the Inventory UI's Sacred Symbol tab Open button flickered when the enhanceable Grand Sacred Symbol was equipped.
    • Resolved an issue where you could not open the Grand Sacred Symbol UI in the boss content Rewards Phase.
    • Resolved an issue where the Heart Teddy Damage Skin (Unit) displayed incorrect units.
    • Resolved an issue where the Cyber-Tirnog Action Damage Skin displayed incorrect units.
    • Resolved an issue where calculating scores for flag race displayed incorrectly.
    • Resolved an issue where the confirmation dialgue for Arcane Catalyst mentioned Sacred Symbols instead of Arcane Symbols.
    • Resolved an issue where the Heroic Skill did not mention Meso % increased in the description.
    • Resolved an issue where text would overflow in the Hyper Stat Level Up UI.
    • Resolved an issue where Radiant Javelin II graphics would sometimes be visible to other players who have skill effects fully transparent.
    • Resolved an issue where the Labyrinth Master Label Ring graphics would cover the guild name and emblem.
    • Resolved an issue where the minimum listing price and 7 day average sale price for Nodestone in the Auction House was not displayed.

    Quest Bug Fixes

    • Changed the ‘Azwan Ghosts Who Speak Too Much’ achievement conditions. You can complete achievements upon proceeding with all Azwan quests.
    • Resolved an issue where quests were sometimes able to be completed even after the quest had expired.
    • Resolved an issue where the quest guide displayed awkwardly after Genesis Crux was defeated during the Genesis Weapon Quest.
    • Resolved an issue where leveling up during a Cross World Party Quest would sometimes crash the game.
    • Resolved an issue where selecting 'Guild Castle' while in cross world content would sometimes crash the game.
    • Resolved an issue where Renault was unable to send Phantoms to Kritias Station.
    • Resolved an issue where Strange Letter could not be completed by Kanna characters.

    Item Bug Fixes

    • Resolved an issue where various Ear Sensors were not visible when hanging on a ladder or rope:
      • Basic Pink Nadoroid Ear Sensor
      • Basic Blue Nadoroid Ear Sensor
      • Deluxe Pink Nadoroid Ear Sensor
      • Deluxe Blue Nadoroid Ear Sensor
    • Resolved an issue with the Crispy Fried Hat item icon image appearing awkwardly.
    • Resolved an issue where the Pet Equipment Innocence Scroll 100% was not usable on Mechanical Heart.
    • Resolved an issue where the Charm EXP text looked awkward.
    • Resolved an issue where some Sacred Symbol Coupon’s tradable item info was displayed incorrectly.
    • Resolved an issue where the Weekly Reward: Default Distribution Amount Enhancement 3 gave Karma Hard Cubes instead of Karma Solid Cubes.
    • Resolved an issue where Blue Soul Ring could not be unequipped by some Angelic Busters.
    • Resolved an issue where the text was formatted incorrectly for Spiegelmann's Magic Hat.
    • Resolved an issue where Althea's Weapon displayed incorrectly when sitting.
    • Resolved an issue where Mannequins placed in a players home were positioned incorrectly.
    • Resolved an issue where the Berserked Cape Effect would sometimes not turn off.
    • Resolved an issue where Dream Blessing graphics would show on the arm while in combat stance.
    • Resolved an issue where Nodestones would rarely create 2 skill Boost Nodes for Luminous.
    • Resolved an issue where multiple Dominator Pendants could be equipped.
    • Resolved an issue where the Pimp Stick graphic would appear in front of a characters hand when held.

    NPC Bug Fixes

    • Resolved an issue where the NPC appearance would not adjust to quest conditions in the Storage Room UI.
    • Resolved an issue where Neville did not sell Gold Emblems for Kanna, Hayato, and Lynn characters.

    Cash Shop Changes

    • Multiple items can be purchased at one time for items with purchase limits in the Cash Shop.
    • Resolved an issue where Maple Rewards Shop and special items had text errors.
    • Resolved an issue where there was text overlap when purchasing multiple items.

    Back to Top

    BURNING EVENTS

    Champion Burning Double Up

    January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the ‘[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Double it and give it to the next person? Let’s take it further - double the rewards for not just one but two characters at once! Set one character as your Leader and empower your other characters at the same time!

    How to Participate

    • Select ‘Champion Burning’ from the Event List and click ‘Participate’ to start the Champion Burning Double Up event.
      • Alternatively, accept the ‘[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine’ quest by talking to Dame Appropriation.
    • Participation is limited to one world per account, so choose wisely!

    Designating Characters

    • Open the Champion Burning UI and press the ‘Designate’ button.
    • The first Champion designated becomes the Leader, and 2 other characters can be designated as Champions.
      • The Leader can be changed once a week from your designated Champions.
      • When switching Leaders, any unused Double Up EXP Points from the current Leader will be lost.

    • Once designated, there will be a visual effect where Champions are following the Leader. The effect activates automatically when changing maps or logging back in.
      • This effect can be toggled on/off through the Skills UI in the Beginner’s tab.

    Note: If the Leader has World Leaped, a different character can be designated as the Leader in Burning World to participate in the event again.

    Double Up EXP Points

    • When the Leader defeats monsters near their level (20 levels below and 20 levels above), the other Champions receive 1 Double Up EXP Point for every monster defeated.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
      • Monster defeats will count when summoning monsters with VIP Booster.
    • Double Up EXP Points are evenly distributed among the Champions, with a weekly cap of 100,000 points.
    • Log in as each Champion to claim and use the earned EXP points.
      • Double Up EXP Points can be used on Mega Burning, Tera Burning, and Hyper Burning characters.

    Note: If the Leader has World Leaped and the remaining Champions in Burning World are not transferred, those Champions cannot use Double Up EXP Points or access the Double Up Coin Shop.

    Double Up Coins

    • The Leader can complete Double Up check-ins to earn Double Up Coins by defeating 2,000 monsters near their level (20 levels above or 20 levels below).
      • Check-in 3 times a week, up to a total of 24 times.
      • Only the Leader can click the ‘Claim’ check-in button.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
    • For each check-in, all Champions receive 2,500 Double Up Coins.
      • Coins and purchases in the Double Up Coin Shop are saved for existing Champions but are not shared among characters.
    • Spend 3,000 Maple Points to use a Double Up Pass for missed check-in days.
      • All Champions will receive 2,500 Double Up Coins, for each Double Up Pass used.

    Double Up EXP Points and Double Up Check-in weekly records reset every Thursday at 12:00 AM UTC.

    Back to Top

    Champion Burning Double Up Coin Shop

    Burning Double Up Coin Shop Duration: January 15 - March 23 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Coin (Double Up Coin) Acquisition Period: January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters designated as Champion (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    • Open the Champion Burning UI and press the ‘Open Shop’ button to open the shop.
    • Double Up Coins are specific to each Champion character and the quantity limit for items are limited to individual purchases per character. The quantity limit isn’t shared with all Champions together; it is instead applied for each individual Champion character.

    Champion Burning Challenge

    February 12 (after maintenance) - March 18 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the ‘[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Got what it takes? Put your skills to the test and challenge a new boss each week to earn rewards that’ll boost your character's growth!

    How to Participate

    • Select ‘Champion Burning’ from the Event List and click ‘Participate’ to start the Champion Challenge event.
    • Select the world for the Champion Challenge by pressing the ‘Start’ button when you begin.
      • You CANNOT change worlds once selected, so choose carefully.

    Weekly Missions

    • Participate with up to 3 different characters in the same world and challenge a new boss available each week to get rewards!
      • Challenges can be completed once a week per character.
      • A character that has completed a mission cannot partake in any other challenges for the week.
      • Characters that are not part of Champion Burning Double Up can also participate in the Champion Burning Challenge.
    • Each weekly mission can be completed from the moment after the mission is available up until the event ends.
    • Receive Challenge Coins for completing the weekly challenges, and exchange them at the Challenge Coin Shop for various items.
      • Select the ‘Open Shop’ button at the bottom right of the Champion Burning UI to open the Champion Burning Challenge Coin Shop.
      • Challenge Coins can only be claimed once per account.
      • Challenge Coins owned are shared between characters within the same world, while purchase records are shared within account.

    Special Missions

    • A Special Mission to defeat Verus Hilla (Hard Mode) will also be available during the entire event period and can be completed with up to 3 different characters in the same world.
      • Characters that are not part of Champion Burning Double Up can also participate in the Special Missions.
    • Complete the Special Mission 3 times to receive a special reward.
      • Defeating a boss in Practice Mode counts toward the mission progress, but the boss must be defeated solo.
      • Defeating Verus Hilla (Hard Mode) before the February 12 maintenance with a character that completed '[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine' will not be marked as cleared. Please note only Verus Hilla (Hard Mode) defeats after maintenance will count.
      • If a boss was defeated without pressing the ‘Challenge’ button after the weekly mission unlocks, you can still press the ‘Challenge’ button afterward and the mission will count as clear.
      • If the name of a character that cleared a Champion Challenge mission is changed, the UI will display the character's name at the time the mission was cleared.

    Champion Challenge Mission Rewards

    • Receive the following rewards when you complete weekly and special missions:

    Mission Type

    Mission Content

    Start Date

    Complete 1 Time

    Complete 2 Times

    Complete 3 Times

    Weekly Mission
    Reach Lv. 250+ February 12 (after maintenance) Challenge Coin (x1,000) Challenge Coin (x1,000) Challenge Coin (x1,000)
    Defeat Lotus Solo (any difficulty) February 19 12:00 AM UTC
    Defeat Guardian Angel Slime Solo (any difficulty) February 26 12:00 AM UTC
    Defeat Lucid Solo (any difficulty) March 5 12:00 AM UTC
    Defeat Darknell Solo (any difficulty) March 12 12:00 AM UTC
    Special Mission Defeat Verus Hilla Solo x3 (Hard Mode) February 12 (after maintenance)
    • Champion Medal Coupon: Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use the coupon to receive:
      • Champion Medal: Untradable, Permanent. (Anvils cannot be used on this item)
    • Karma Abyssal Rebirth Flame (x50): Tradable within world, 7-day duration.

    Note: Special Mission rewards can only be claimed when Verus Hilla has been defeated 3 times by 3 different characters.

    Back to Top

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters designated as Champion (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    • Open the Champion Burning UI and press the ‘Open Shop’ button to open the shop.
    • Challenge Coins are shared between characters within the same world.

    Burning World Leap

    February 12 (after maintenance) - February 27 at 2:00 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 150 and above characters created in Burning World. (Zero characters must have completed up to Chapter 2).

    • Once your Burning World journey ends, it’s time to find yourself a new home!
    • After maintenance, your characters will be moved to the Burning Leap Zone map where you can proceed with Burning World Leap by talking to Mover.
    • You can move up to 5 characters that meet the following requirements:
      • Your characters, regardless of whether they are a ‘Burning’ character or not, must be Lv. 150 and above to World Leap. (Zero characters must have completed up to Chapter 2)
    • Characters can ONLY be transferred to Interactive worlds. You can only transfer within your region.
    • You may send your Burning World characters all to the same world, or different worlds.
    • You can move the character even if you don’t have an empty character slot in the world you chose.
      • If you have reached the max character limit in the world you chose, you will have to delete a character first and create an empty slot before moving your Burning World characters to that world.
      • If the world you chose has empty character slots, one of the open character slots will be used.
    • Your character must leave or disband their Guild before proceeding with World Leap.
      • When you talk to Mover, you will be given the option to Disband the Guild or the Alliance. You can also use the Guild UI to leave the Guild.
    • Your character's equipped items, inventory, and mesos will be transferred with your character.
    • Items in your Cash Shop Inventory, Storage, Auction House, and mail will not be transferred with the character. Please remember to move these items to your inventory before Burning World Leap.
    • Characters that don't transfer within the Burning World Leap period will be removed.
    • All mesos, items, and cash items owned by the character that didn't transfer will be removed.
    • The number of items that can be purchased per world will follow the criteria of the world you leap when you World Leap.
    • Backgrounds obtained through coupons are extracted and transferred with World Leap.
    • Legion Artifact Special Missions completed in Burning World remain completed after transferring with World Leap.
    • If you participated in but didn't complete Epic Dungeon in Burning World before leaping, you must reset your records and particpate again in the new world to claim rewards.

    Back to Top

    EXTRADIMENSIONAL VISITORS EVENTS

    Extradimensional Visitors

    January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    A new Dimensional Crack has appeared in Maple World! Suspicions point to Gerand Darmoor, but the truth is yet to be uncovered. Join the Alliance to investigate this mystery and explore Tirnog.

    • Select ‘Extradimensional Visitors’ within the Event List on the left side of the screen and click ‘Participate’ to start the ‘[Visitors] Edea’s Call’ quest.
    • Upon accepting the quest, you will teleport to the event map, Tirnog Interior.
    • Players who complete the starting quest can enter until March 23 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    Back to Top

    Tirnog Hashtag

    February 12 (after maintenance) - March 18 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Team up with Roan to fully customize your very own chair! Defeat monsters, collect Hashtag Points, and unlock all the customizable chair features to make it one of a kind!

    How to Participate

    • Accept the ‘[Hashtag] Tirnog Special Tag System’ quest by talking to Roan located in Tirnog Interior.
      • Alternatively, accept the quest by clicking ‘Tirnog Hashtag’ then ‘Participate’ within the event list.
    • Receive a Hashtag Master Chair (3.0) the first time the quest is completed within the world.
      • Make sure to participate and complete it with the character that you want to claim the chair the first time you do this quest.
      • Additional Hashtag Master Chair (3.0) Coupons can be purchased from the Tirnog Meso Shop.
    • The Hashtag Master Chair (3.0) is a chair that you can decorate by customizing the appearance, hashtags, and emoticons.

    Decorating Hashtag Master Chair

    • Customize the Hashtag Master Chair (3.0) within the Tirnog Hashtag UI.
      • Chair customization is available until March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
    • Check in daily to raise the Hashtag level of your chair to unlock more ways to customize your chair!

    Hashtag Check-in

    • Defeat 1,000 monsters within your level range (20 levels below and 20 levels above) to complete a check-in, receive rewards, and raise the Hashtag level of your chair!
      • Each check-in can be completed once a day, up to 5 times a week per account for a total of 20 times.
      • Check-ins are shared between all characters per account.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
    • For 3,000 Maple Points, you can use the Hashtag Pass to complete a missed check-in.
      • The total number of missed check-ins and Hashtag Passes available for purchase reset every Wednesday at 12:00 AM UTC.

    Hashtag Check-in Rewards

    • For every daily check-in, receive one Small Otherworld Sun Generator: Tradable within world, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
      • Can be used to charge the Otherworldly Sun in the Tyrobot Playground and doesn’t count towards the weekly Otherwordly Sun recharge count.
      • The effect is only active during the event. Any remaining charges will not apply after the event ends.
    • For every 5 check-ins, increase the level of your chair and receive the following rewards:
    Hashtag Check-in Rewards
    Check-in Count Hashtag Level Item Quantity Tradability/Duration
    5 Lv.2 Symbol Selector Coupon (200/40) 1 Tradable within world, 7-day duration.
    10 Lv.3 Karma Black Rebirth Flame 50
    15 Lv.4 Magnificent Growth Potion 1
    20 Sol Erda 1

    Special Hashtag

    • Defeat monsters near your level for a chance to obtain ‘Special Hashtag Points’ that can be used to get special decorations.
      • Special decorations can only be used by the character that obtained them.
    • Special Hashtag Points are used in the order they appear in the inventory regardless of tradability.
      • (Heroic Worlds) Special Hashtag Points: Tradable within world, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
      • (Interactive Worlds) Special Hashtag Points: Tradable once, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
        • Can be traded once, after that it will be changed to tradable between characters within world.
    • Exchange 5 Special Hashtag Points for one VIP Booster through the ‘Exchange’ button in the Tirnog Hashtag UI.
    • Use a VIP Booster to summon Flame monsters that give a large amount of EXP when defeated within 100 seconds.
      • Use VIP Boosters up to 10 times a day per character.
      • VIP Booster usage records reset daily at 12:00 AM UTC.
      • Flame monsters do not count towards quests requiring monster defeats.
    • VIP Boosters cannot be used for the following situations:
      • In a map or town where monsters are not within your level range.
      • Maps where you or another player have used the VIP Booster already.
        • Heroic Worlds: up to 2 players in an instanced map after Grandis can use VIP Boosters.
        • Other Special Fields (Event Field, Mirror World, Story Quest Field etc.)

    Hashtag check-in availability records reset every Wednesday at 12:00 AM UTC.

    Back to Top

    Blueprints for Tirnog

    January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the ‘[Visitors] Edea’s Call’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    The Dimensional Machine needs repairs! Help restore it by collecting blueprints and earn amazing rewards!

    How to Participate

    • Accept the ‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest by talking to Cledd located in Tirnog Interior.
      • Alternatively, accept the quest by clicking ‘Blueprints for Tirnog’ then ‘Participate’ within the Event UI located in the star icon on the left side of the screen.
    • Use the ‘Blueprints for Tirnog’ button in the event list to track your event progress at any time!
    • Participate in collecting two types of blueprints for Tirnog: Basic Draft and Detailed Draft.

    Basic Draft

    • Complete a Basic Draft by logging in each day to claim rewards.
      • Each Basic Draft can be completed once a day, up to 5 times a week per account.
      • Rewards are claimable once per account.
    • Receive the following Draft Rewards for every completed Basic Draft:

    Bonus Basic Draft Rewards

    Item

    Quantity

    Tradability/Duration

    3x EXP Coupon (30 min)

    Dimensional Tome 

    (Gob’s Gift Event Currency)

    5

    Untradable, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    Dimensional Orb

    (Gob’s Gift Event Currency)

    5

    Untradable, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    Detailed Draft

    • Defeat 2,000 monsters within your level range (20 levels below and 20 levels above) to complete a Detailed Draft and earn rewards that’ll help with your character's growth.
      • Each Detailed Draft can be completed 3 times a week, up to 24 times per account.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
    • Receive the following rewards for every completed Detailed Draft:

    Bonus Basic Draft Rewards

    Item

    Quantity

    Tradability/Duration

    EXP Voucher

    1,000

    Tradable within world, 7-day duration.

    Dimensional Spring (Dimensional Spring Exchange Currency)

    1,000

    Untradable, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    Note: The Blueprints for Tirnog Basic Draft and Detailed Draft progress is shared among all characters that have completed the ‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest, within the same account.

    • Not able to complete the Basic or Detailed Drafts? You still have a chance to complete it with 3,000 Maple Points!
    • Amount of available pass usage count is limited to the number of incomplete Basic/Detailed drafts based on every Wednesday at 12:00 AM UTC.
      • The number of available Basic/Detailed pass uses can be viewed from the Blueprints for Tirnog UI.

    Basic Draft and Detailed Draft check-in records reset every Wednesday at 12:00 AM UTC.

    Back to Top

    Gob’s Gift

    January 15 - March 18 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Trade your Dimensional Tomes and Dimensional Orbs for Gob’s Gift, a blessing from the ancient god that will boost your character’s growth!

    How to Participate

    • Accept the ‘[Gob’s Gift] Ancient God’s Gift’ quest by talking to Luchta located in Tirnog Interior.
      • Alternatively, accept the quest by clicking ‘Gob’s Gift’ then ‘Participate’ within the Event UI located in the star icon on the left side of the screen.
    • Exchange Dimensional Tomes to receive a Mysterious Blessing Skill of your choice.
    • Exchange Dimensional Orbs to receive a Mysterious Energy Effect of your choice.

    • Dimensional Tomes and Dimensional Orbs can be obtained by completing a Basic Draft in Blueprints for Tirnog.
    • You can purchase 10 Dimensional Tomes and 10 Dimensional Orbs for 9,900 Maple Points each per week.
    • Dimensional Tome and Dimensional Orb are shared between all characters within the same world who have completed the ‘[Gob’s Gift] Ancient God’s Gift’ quest.

    Tyrobot Playground

    January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Gain EXP while you vibe on the side in the Tyrobot Playground!

    How to Participate

    • Accept the ‘[Tyrobot Playground] Where Robots Play’ quest by talking to Jink located in Tirnog Interior.
      • Alternatively, accept the quest by clicking ‘Tyrobot Playground’ then ‘Participate’ within the Event UI located in the star icon on the left side of the screen.
    • Upon completing the quest, talk to Jink again to teleport to the Tyrobot Playground.
    • While in the Tyrobot Playground, receive EXP based on your level every 5 seconds
      • Lv. 289 and above characters receive the same amount of EXP obtained at Lv. 289.

    Otherworldly Sun

    • Charge the Otherworldly Sun with an Otherworldly Sun Generator while in the Tyrobot Playground to obtain even more EXP.
      • Otherworldly Sun Generators can be earned by completing the Basic Draft of Blueprints for Tirnog.
      • Each generator extends the sun’s duration by 30 minutes.

    • The Otherworldly Sun charge time is shared among all characters in the same account and only decreases while in the Tyrobot Playground.
      • The time left will not decrease when you leave the game.
    • Purchase additional charges that charge for an hour, up to 12 times a week per account for 3,000 Maple Points.
      • Weekly charge limits resets every Wednesday at 12:00 AM UTC.
    • Speak to Jink in Tyrobot Playground to check the remaining time and charge the Otherworldly Sun.

    Note: The effect is only active during the event. Any remaining charges will not apply after the event ends.

    Back to Top

    Dimensional Spring Exchange

    Dimensional Spring Exchange Shop Duration: January 15 - March 23 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Coin (Dimensional Spring) Acquisition Period: January 15 - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the ‘[Blueprint] Now Hiring Engineer for Tirnog’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    • Access the Dimensional Spring Exchange by talking to Cheeko located in Tirnog Interior.
    • Use Dimensional Springs obtained from completing Detailed Drafts in the Blueprints for Tirnog event to purchase items.
    • Dimensional Springs are shared between characters within the same world and are obtainable until March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
    • The acquisition rate and usage rate of Dimensional Springs are shared by all characters under the same account. 
    • The Dimensional Spring Exchange Shop remains open until March 23 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    OTHER EVENTS

    Space Star Pink Bean

    March 5 at 12:00 AM UTC - March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the '[Space Star] Pink Bean's Stellar Entrance' starting quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Pink Bean wants to escape the bounds of Maple World and take the whole galaxy by storm! Let’s help our worldwide star Pink Bean create a fan slogan and receive gifts~

    How to Participate

    • Participate in the '[Space Star] Pink Bean's Stellar Entrance' quest by heading over to the Event List on the left of your screen and click the ‘Participate’ button.
      • Alternatively, you can talk to Pink Bean located in the main towns (Henesys, Nameless Town, Cernium Square).
    • Defeat monsters near your level (20 levels below and 20 levels above) for a chance to obtain Pink Bundles or Hot Pink Bundles.
      • Pink Bundle: Tradable within world, expires March 18 at 11:59PM UTC.
      • (Heroic Worlds) Hot Pink Bundle: Tradable within world, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
      • (Interactive Worlds) Hot Pink Bundle: Tradable once, expires March 18 at 11:59 PM UTC.
        • Can be traded once, after that it will be changed to tradable between characters within world.
      • Hot Pink Bundle is used in the order the bundles are located in the inventory, regardless of tradability.
    • Receive one Alphabet Letter at a set rate when a Pink Bundle or Hot Pink Bundle is opened. Collect enough Alphabet Letters to complete a Pink Bean Fan Slogan and earn rewards!
      • You can obtain up to 99 for each alphabet letter.
      • Your character’s item drop rate will also apply to the set rate.
      • Alphabet Letters obtained by opening the bundle are shared between characters within the same world and are untradable..
    Obtainable Alphabet Letters by from Pink & Hot Pink Bundles
    Rarity Alphabet Letter
    High K, P, T, U
    Medium A, I, N, S, V
    Low All other alphabet letters
    • You can purchase an additional Pink Bundle x20 for 3,000 Maple Points once a day per world!
      • Hot Pink Bundle is used in the order the bundles are located in the inventory, regardless of tradability.
      • When the bundle is opened, there is a set chance of obtaining Alphabet Letters according to each Alphabet Letter's level of rarity.
      • The expiration of the Pink Bundle purchased is the same as the event's end date, and can be transferred between your characters within the world.
    • Event progress such as the amount of Alphabet Letters owned, completed Fan Slogans, and Alphabet Powder are shared between characters within the same world.
      • Check the amount of Alphabet Letters owned through the Event UI.

    Crafting Alphabet Letters

    • Need a specific letter for a fan slogan? Craft it using Alphabet Powder!
    • Obtain Alphabet Powder by combining any 5 letters collected from the Pink Bundles or Hot Pink Bundles.
      • The total amount of Alphabet Powder obtained from combining letters is calculated based on the rarity of each letter used.
    • Use Alphabet Powder to craft the letter of your choice!
    Alphabet Powder Obtained from Combining Letters & Alphabet Letter Crafting Costs
    Alphabet Letter Alphabet Powder Obtained per Letter Crafting Cost
    (Alphabet Powder)
    K, P, T, U 250 5,000
    A, I, N, S, V 75 1,500
    All other alphabet letters 5 100

    Space Star Pink Bean Rewards

    • Hidden Mission Alert! Complete the Hidden Mission to obtain a Sync Label and Chat Ring.
    • Complete Fan Slogan's to receive the following rewards:
    Fan Slogan Item Tradability/Duration
    STAR
    • Symbol Selector Coupon (300/60): Use the coupon to choose one of the following:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector x300
      • Sacred Symbol Selector x60
    • Dream Voyage Shoes Coupon: Use the coupon to choose one of the following:
      • Dream Voyage Shoes (M): Untradable, Permanent.

      • Dream Voyage Heels (F): Untradable, Permanent.

    		 Tradable within world, 7-day duration.
    UNIVERSE
    • EXP Voucher (x3,000)
    • Dream Voyage Cape Coupon: Use the coupon to receive:
      • Dream Voyager Cape: Untradable, Permanent.
    PINK BEAN
    • Karma Black Rebirth Flame (x100)
    • Dream Voyage Outfit Coupon: Use the coupon to choose one of the following:
      • Dream Voyage Suit (M): Untradable, Permanent.

      • Dream Voyage Dress (F): Untradable, Permanent.
    UNIVERSE STAR
    • Pink Star Box: Open the box to choose one of the following:
      • Magnificent Growth Potion: Tradable within world, 7-day duration.
      • Sol Erda: Tradable within world, 7-day duration.
    • Dream Voyage Hat Coupon: Use the coupon to choose one of the following:
      • Dream Voyage Hat (M): Untradable, Permanent.

      • Dream Voyage Beret (F): Untradable, Permanent.
    UNIVERSE PINK STAR
    • Karma Star Force 17-Star Enhancement (Lv. 200)
    • Dream Voyage Weapon Coupon: Use the coupon to receive:
      • Dream Wheel: Untradable, Permanent.
    Final Reward
    (Complete all fan slogans)
    • Syncroid Coupon: Use the coupon to receive the following:
      • Syncroid: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Lidium Heart: Untradable, Permanent.
    Hidden Mission Reward
    • Sync Label Ring Coupon: Use the coupon to receive the following:
      • Sync Label Ring Untradable, Permanent.
    • Sync Chat Ring Coupon: Use the coupon to receive the following:
      • Sync Chat Ring Untradable, Permanent.

    Be sure to claim all your rewards from the Event UI before the event period ends!

    Back to Top

    Sunny Sunday

    February 16 - March 16 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 101 and above characters (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).

    Log in each Sunday during the event duration to enjoy various perks!

    Sunny Sunday Schedule

    Date (UTC)

    Perks

    February 16, 2025
    • 30% off Star Force enhancements
    • 250% Monster Park Clear Bonus EXP

    February 23, 2025
    • Rune Appearance Cooldown and Cooldown Reduction
    • +100% Rune EXP buff effect (3x normal EXP)
    • +300% Combo Kill EXP

    March 2, 2025
    • 50% off Ability resets
    • 50% off Spell Trace enhancements
    • 3x EXP for Pollo, Fritto, and Especia Bounty Hunting
    • 3x Inferno Wolf Exit EXP

    March 9, 2025
    • 100% Success Chance when Enhancing from Star Force +5, +10, and +15
    • 2x chance for new Monster Collection monsters
    • Monster Collection 'Mysterious Monsterbloom' x3 given

    March 16, 2025
    • [HEXA Stat] When the Main Stat is Lv. 5 and above, your chance to enhance the Main Stat is increased by 20%

    Cash Shop Update for February 12


    NOTE: These Cash Shop sales will be available following the maintenance on February 12.

    Valentine Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 18, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Valentine Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the items within the Valentine Surprise Style Box.

    Clive: Home Party Bonnet, Lively Party Planner (M), Party Promise, Colorful Confetti, and Rainbow Star Garland.
    Lani: Party Cat Bonnet, Zesty Party Planner (F), Party Promise, Colorful Confetti, and Rainbow Star Garland.

    Sali: Black Sheep Transformation Hat, Black Sheep Transformation Outfit, Pink Puzzle Weapon, Angel Wing Shoes, Dokidoki, First Love Label Ring, and First Love Chat Ring.
    Fria: Fluttering Cutie Outfit, Fluttering Cutie Shoes, Shy Choco Weapon, Heart-Heart Sunglasses, Ribbon Kitty Tail, Peach Bloom Effect Hat, First Love Label Ring, and First Love Chat Ring.

    Rocko: Cream Gelato, Vanilla Pudding, Soft Soufflé, Cookie Baby, Coo Coo Cookie Cutter, Chu! Label Ring, and Chu! Chat Ring.
    Miranna: Chillingly Sweet Beret, Chillingly Sweet Honey Outfit, Chillingly Sweet Star Decoration, Chillingly Sweet Lollipop, Chu! Label Ring, and Heart Face Painting.

    Blindi: Sweet Fresh Cream Dessert Shoes, Apple Bunny Hat, Apple Bunny Shirt, Guinea Pig Weapon, Red Rose Chat Ring, Red Rose Label Ring, Love Gloves, and Rose.
    Bruni: Odd Rabbit Doll.
    Svenn: Sugarsweet Candy Hat, Sugarsweet Candy Boy Outfit, Sugarsweet Candy Cape, Sugarsweet Candy Spear, Red Rose Chat Ring, Red Rose Label Ring, Love Gloves, and Kiss Mark.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box stamps.

    Valentine's Royal Style Coupons

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 18, 2025 11:59 PM

    Premium Surprise Style Box Stamp Exchange

    Updated February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) in all worlds:

    If you receive items from the Premium Surprise Style Box that you no longer want, you can exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive an Avatar Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice!

    This system gives players in Heroic Worlds an option to get rid of PSSB items they no longer want while still gaining value. Players in Interactive Worlds can use this system as an alternative to trading the items.

    The items available through the stamp exchange have been updated! Here are the items currently available:

    • Soft Plushy Label Ring Coupon

      • Price: 35 Tokens

      • Price: 40 Tokens

      • Price: 35 Tokens

    • PST/PDT (UTC -8/-7): Wednesday, February 5, 2025 11:30 AM - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:30 PM - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Thursday, February 6, 2025 6:30 AM - Thursday, March 19, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    Available in all worlds:

    • Gachapon Ticket
      • Price (1): 1,000 NX
      • Price (11): 10,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Note: Gachapon update may take around 10 minutes before or after the scheduled rotation at 11:30 AM PST / 8:30 PM CET / 6:30 AM AEDT. Please refrain from using your Gachapon ticket during this time to ensure you receive items from the new rotation.

    Gachapon Tickets can give you a number of items, including chairs, mounts, damage skins, and other items. There are also unique items you can only get depending on if you're in a Heroic or an Interactive world. Look below to see some of the items currently available from the Gachapon Ticket.

    Premium Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 18, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +10): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Premium Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the most recent additions to the Premium Surprise Style Box.

    Fria: Glacial Horns, Glacial Armor, Glacial Icewalkers, Glacial Spear, and Glacial Flower.
    Sali: Glacial Tiara, Glacial Dress, Glacial Snowdancers, Glacial Spear, and Glacial Flower.

    Miranna: Long Shadows, Light Opposite Memory (F), Lonely Steps (F), One Night Mirage, and Althea's Weapon.
    Clive: Looming Darkness, Light Beyond Memory (M), Gloomy Steps (M), One Night Mirage, and Lonely Flapping.

    Rocko: Snowflake Ribbon, Snow Dancer (M), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.
    Miranna: Snowflake Ribbon, Winter Dancer (F), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.

    Fria: Cyber Street Punk Beanie Black, Cyber Street Punk Hood Black, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box Stamps.

    SALES ENDING THIS WEEK

    Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat and Magic Hat: Pet

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 29, 2025 12:00 AM - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 29, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 29, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    Available in all worlds:

    • Spiegelmann's Magic Hat: Pet
      • Price (1): 9,900 NX
      • Price (10): 99,000 NX
      • Duration: 7 days
    • Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat: Pet
      • Price (1): 9,900 NX
      • Price (10): 99,000 NX
      • Duration: 7 days

    Spiegelmann's Magic Hat: Pet and Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat: Pet both reward you with an Illusion Ring that, when equipped in a Cash Ring slot, fully transforms your character's appearance into that of a pet! You'll be able to move, attack, jump, and do just about everything in this new appearance, hiding all equipped outfit items and weapons.

    Spiegelmann's Magic Hat and Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat give the same selection of appearances, however the Magic Hat Illusion Rings will appear at normal size, and the Grand Magic Hat Illusion Rings will be Giant-sized, twice as large as the normal versions.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    Open Spiegelmann's Magic Hat: Pet or Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat: Pet to obtain one of the Illusion Rings listed below in the appropriate size, from left to right:

    • Brown Kitty, Black Kitty, Puppy, Husky, Pig, Mini Kargo, Pink Bunny, White Bunny, and Monkey.

    • Lace Cap Brown Kitty, Lace Cap Black Kitty, Hat Puppy, Gentleman Husky, Ribbon Pig, Lace Cap Mini Kargo, Ribbon Pink Bunny, Ribbon White Bunny, and Hat Monkey.

    • Bell Ribbon Brown Kitty, Bell Ribbon Black Kitty, Panda Puppy, Bunny Husky, Orange Mushroom Pig, Wings Mini Kargo, Scarf Pink Bunny, Scarf White Bunny, and Sack Monkey.

    After purchasing Spiegelmann's Magic Hat: Pet or Spiegelmann's Grand Magic Hat: Pet, you will need to transfer the box to your inventory, and then open it to receive an Illusion Ring.

    日服冒险岛公告


    ウィンターロイヤルヘアークーポン/ ロイヤルフェイスクーポン


    日ごろは『メイプルストーリー』をご愛顧いただきありがとうございます。

    2025年2月12日(水)11:00から、ポイントアイテム「ウィンターロイヤルへアクーポン」と「ウィンターロイヤルフェイスクーポン」を販売します。

    販売期間

    2025年2月12日(水) 11:00 ～ 2025年3月5日(水) メンテナンス前

    アイテム詳細

    ウィンターロイヤルヘアクーポン

    カテゴリ 商品名 価格(NEXONポイント) 使用期限 購入制限
    美容 ウィンターロイヤルヘアクーポン 290 90日 なし
    ※購入後、[キャッシュインベントリ]でダブルクリックすると、[アイテムインベントリ]＞[癒し]タブに移動します。

    〇女性キャラクター/アンドロイド
    女性キャラクター/アンドロイドで「ウィンターロイヤルヘアクーポン」を1回ご使用いただくと、以下の髪型からいずれか1つがキャラクターに適用されます。

    〇男性キャラクター/アンドロイド
    男性キャラクター/アンドロイドで「ウィンターロイヤルヘアクーポン」を1回ご使用いただくと、以下の髪型からいずれか1つがキャラクターに適用されます。


    ウィンターロイヤルフェイスクーポン

    カテゴリ 商品名 価格(NEXONポイント) 使用期限 購入制限
    美容 ウィンターロイヤルフェイスクーポン 290 90日 なし
    ※購入後、[キャッシュインベントリ]でダブルクリックすると、[アイテムインベントリ]＞[癒し]タブに移動します。

    〇女性キャラクター/アンドロイド
    女性キャラクター/アンドロイドで「ウィンターロイヤルフェイスクーポン」を1回ご使用いただくと、以下のフェイスからいずれか1つがキャラクターに適用されます。

    〇男性キャラクター/アンドロイド
    男性キャラクター/アンドロイドで「ウィンターロイヤルフェイスクーポン」を1回ご使用いただくと、以下のフェイスからいずれか1つがキャラクターに適用されます。

    注意事項
    ※該当アイテムを使用して適用されるヘア/フェイスの内容は、今後変更される可能性があります。
    ※一部ヘアおよびフェイスの色が、カテゴリと異なる配色の場合がありますが、仕様として設定されたものです。
    ※メンテナンスによって販売期間が変更になる可能性があります。

    一覧へ戻る

    サンデーメイプル


    毎週日曜日に様々なプレイ特典が付与されます！逃さずチェックしましょう！

    開催期間

    ・2025年2月16日(日) 00:00 ~ 23:59
    ・2025年2月23日(日) 00:00 ~ 23:59
    ・2025年3月2日(日) 00:00 ~ 23:59

    イベント特典

    2月16日(日) の特典

    特典1
    アビリティ再設定費用50％割引

    特典2
    呪文の痕跡強化費用50％割引

    特典3
    「賞金稼ぎ兄弟ポロとプリト」「賞金稼ぎエスペシア」クリア時の経験値200％追加

    特典4
    「火花オオカミ」退場時の経験値200％追加

    特典5
    「モンスターパークエクストリーム」のクリア経験値250%追加

    2月23日(日) の特典

    特典1
    「モンスターパーク」のクリア経験値250％追加

    特典2
    モンスターコレクションの新規モンスター登録確率100%追加
    (スキル「アドベンチャラーキュリアス」と重複適用)
    ※登録確率100%追加状態だと元々の登録確率の2倍になります。

    特典3
    謎のモンスターエッグ 3個支給
    特典アイテムは画面左のからイベントリストを開き、 「サンデーメイプルプレゼントがもらえます！」を選択して「参加する」ボタンを押すと受取可能です。
    アイコン アイテム 個数 交換有無 期限 備考
    謎のモンスターエッグ 3 交換不可 無期限
    ※特典アイテムはレベル101以上のキャラクター(職業「ゼロ」以外)または、ストーリーChapter2を完了した職業「ゼロ」でのみ受取可能です。
    ※特典アイテムはメイプルIDあたり1回のみ受領可能です。

    3月2日(日) の特典

    特典1
    スターフォース5星、10星、15星で強化する際の成功率100％(破壊防止費用とシュペリアル装備は割引対象外)

    注意事項
    ※メンテナンスによって開催期間が変更になる可能性があります。

    一覧へ戻る

    ティルノグハッシュタグ(2月12日12:13更新)


    ハッシュタグレベルを上げて、自分だけの椅子を作りましょう！

    開催期間

    2025年1月29日(水) 0:00 ～ 2025年3月4日(火) 23:59

    イベント参加対象

    イベント「ティルノグ設計図」に参加しているレベル101以上のキャラクター(職業「ゼロ」以外)または、ストーリーChapter2を完了した職業「ゼロ」

    イベント進行方法

    参加方法

    1.画面左のからイベントリストを開き、「次元の訪問者」を選択して「参加する」ボタンを押して受諾します。

    2.イベントリストを開き「ティルノグ設計図」を選択して「参加する」ボタンを押すか、 イベントマップ「ティルノグ内部」にいるNPC「クレッド」からクエスト「[設計図] ティルノグでエンジニアを募集中」を受諾します。


    3.イベントリストを開き「ティルノグハッシュタグ」を選択して「参加する」ボタンを押すか、 イベントマップ「ティルノグ内部」にいるNPC「ラウン」からクエスト「[ハッシュタグ] ティルノグ特製タグシステム」を受諾します。


    4.ワールド内でイベントに最初に参加したキャラクターのみ、「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」を獲得します。
    「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」を所持しているキャラクターは、イベントUIから「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」に利用可能なパーツを確認し、椅子をカスタマイズできます。
    アイコン 報酬 個数 期限 交換可否
    ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2) 1 無期限 交換不可
    ※「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」はイベント「[次元の訪問者]メルショップ」でも獲得できます。

    イベント参加後は、イベントリストから「ティルノグハッシュタグ」を選択するとイベントUIを開けます。


    進行方法

    1.適正レベルモンスターを1,000体退治すると出席可能になります。
    ※適正レベルモンスターは、キャラクターのレベルを基準に-20～+20 レベルに該当するモンスターです。
    ※1人グループ、またはグループに参加していない状態でモンスターを退治するとカウントされます。

    2.イベントUI左上の「出席する」ボタンを押すと出席となり、出席時にデイリー報酬を受領します。

    ※メイプルID毎に1日1回、週に5回、イベント期間中に20回まで出席可能です。(週の出席回数は水曜0時に初期化)

    3.出席5回毎に累積出席報酬を獲得します。
    イベントUI上部の「受領」ボタンから累積出席報酬を受領できます。


    また、出席5回毎に「ハッシュタグレベル」が1上昇し、レベルに応じて「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」のカスタマイズで選択可能なパーツが増加します。
    「ハッシュタグレベル」は4まで上昇します。
    ※「ハッシュタグレベル」はメイプルID内で共有されます。

    スペシャルハッシュポイント

    1.スペシャルハッシュポイント獲得
    適正レベルモンスターを退治すると、アイテム「スペシャルハッシュポイント」が確率でドロップします。
    アイテム「スペシャルハッシュポイント」の所持数はイベントUIにも表示されます。
    アイコン 報酬アイテム 期限 交換可否
    スペシャルハッシュポイント イベント終了時 1回交換可能(交換後はワールド内の自分のキャラクター間のみ移動可能)
    ※倉庫に入れる場合と、メイプルオークションに入れてから別のキャラクターで取り出す場合も交換としてカウントされます。
    ※アイテム「スペシャルハッシュポイント」を使用する場合、交換可能かどうかにかかわらず、インベントリの一番前にあるアイテム「スペシャルハッシュポイント」が使用されます。

    2.スペシャルハッシュポイント使用
    イベントUI左下の「パーツ選択」の「スペシャル」ボタンから、「スペシャルハッシュポイント」を消費して「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」のカスタマイズ用パーツを購入できます。


    また、イベントUI左の「交換」ボタンから、「スペシャルハッシュポイント」5個を「VIPブースター」1個と交換することも可能です。

    アイコン 報酬 個数 期限 交換可否
    VIPブースター 1 7日 ワールド内の自分のキャラクター間のみ移動可能
    ※「VIPブースター」はキャラクター毎に1日10回まで使用できます。(使用回数は毎日0:00に初期化)
    ※「VIPブースター」を使用する場合、交換可能かどうかにかかわらず、インベントリの一番前にある「VIPブースター」が使用されます。

    「VIPブースター」を使用すると、100秒間、倒すと大量の経験値を得られるモンスターが召喚されます。
    ※「VIPブースター」は適正レベルモンスターが出現するマップでのみ使用でき、自分または他のプレイヤーが「VIPブースター」を発動中のマップ(発動前のカウントダウンも含む)、その他特殊フィールド(イベントフィールド、鏡の世界、ストーリークエストフィールドなど)では使用できません。
    ※グランディス以降の個人化フィールドでは、同時に最大2人まで「VIPブースター」を使用できます。
    ※「VIPブースター」使用後にマップ移動、チャンネル移動、ショップ入場を行うと効果が終了します。

    ハッシュパス

    出席できなかった日がある場合、イベントUI右上の「使用する」ボタンを押すと、400メイプルポイントで1日分の出席を完了できます。
    UI上に現在のハッシュパス使用可能回数が表示されます。

    ※ハッシュパスの使用可能回数は、水曜0時基準で先週までに完了していない出席回数です。
    ※メイプルポイントについてはこちらをご参照ください。


    イベント報酬

    デイリー報酬

    アイコン 報酬 個数 期限 交換可否
    小さな次元の日差し生成機 1 イベント終了時 ワールド内の自分のキャラクター間のみ移動可能
    ※「小さな次元の日差し生成機」はイベント「見習いロボットの遊び場」で使用でき、「次元の日差し」を15分チャージできます。


    累積出席報酬

    出席回数 アイコン 報酬 個数 期限 備考
    5 選択型シンボル交換券 1 7日 [選択可能アイテム]
    以下のアイテムのうち1つを選択して獲得可能
    ・選択型アーケインシンボル交換券 200個
    ・選択型オーセンティックシンボル交換券 40個
    選択後のアイテムは期限7日、ワールド内の自分のキャラクター間のみ移動可能
    10 カルマ黒い転生の炎 50 7日
    15 極限成長の秘薬 1 7日
    20 ソルエルダ 1 7日
    ※累積出席報酬は全てメイプルID毎に1回のみ受領できます。
    ※累積出席報酬は全てワールド内の自分のキャラクター間のみ移動可能です。

    ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)のカスタマイズ

    イベント期間中、「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」をカスタマイズできます。
    イベントUI左下の「パーツ選択」の各種項目をカスタマイズして、イベントUI右下の「保存する」ボタンを押すと「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」に見た目が反映されます。


    ※「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」のカスタム状況はキャラクター毎に保存されます。
    ※イベント終了後は「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」をカスタマイズできなくなります。

    カスタム項目

    カスタム項目 説明
    スペシャル 「スペシャルハッシュポイント」を消費して「スペシャルパーツ」を獲得できます。
    また、獲得した「スペシャルパーツ」を選択できます。
    表情 キャラクターの表情を1つ選択できます。
    背景 色または「ティルノグハッシュカメラ」で撮影した背景から1つ選択できます。
    「ハッシュタグレベル」3到達時に「ティルノグハッシュカメラ」が支給されます。
    特定のマップで「ティルノグハッシュカメラ」を使用すると、撮影場所のヒントが表示されます。
    ヒントが示す場所を撮影すると、そのマップの背景を獲得できます。
    ※「ティルノグハッシュカメラ」はイベント終了時まで使用可能で、交換不可です。
    ※「ハッシュタグレベル」3到達時以外でも、「ハッシュタグレベル」3以上かつ「ハッシュタグマスター椅子(Ver.2)」を所持しているキャラクターでイベントマップ「ティルノグ内部」にいるNPC「ラウン」に話しかけると、「ティルノグハッシュカメラ」を受領できます。
    内容 ハッシュタグと絵文字を使って入力できます。
    ハッシュタグは最大4個まで、ハッシュタグと絵文字の合計で最大14個まで使用できます。
    ※1つずつ順番に入力できます。
    ※入力した内容は変更可能ですが、最初に入力した後で内容を空白に戻すことはできません。
    ※内容を削除する場合、最後の内容から順番に削除する必要があります。
    　例：3番目の内容が入力されている場合、2番目の内容を削除することはできません。
    ※同じハッシュタグを同時に使用はできません。
    ※ハッシュタグはキャラクターのワールド/職業/職業群/レベル/ユニオン/業績などによって自動的に獲得されます。
    ポーズ キャラクターのポーズを1つ選択できます。
    いいね設定 「ハッシュタグレベル」4以上になると、100～9,999の数字を指定できます。

    ハッシュタグレベル

    「ハッシュタグレベル」に応じてカスタマイズ機能が強化されます。
    レベル ハッシュタグ
    同時使用可能数    		 表情 絵文字 背景 ポーズ いいね設定
    1 最大1個 3種類 7種類 変更不可 変更不可 変更不可
    2 最大2個 6種類 15種類 6色 11種類
    3 最大3個 9種類 23種類 6色&撮影した背景
    4 最大4個 12種類 59種類 100～9,999の数字を選択可能

    パーツ

    以下のパーツを使用可能です。
    各項目をクリックすると内容が展開されます。

    表情
    名称 表情 使用条件
    基本表情 ハッシュタグレベル1以上
    にこにこ顔
    泣きべそ顔
    怒った顔 ハッシュタグレベル2以上
    ボーゼン顔
    ふくれ顔
    キラキラ ハッシュタグレベル3以上
    キラリ
    キャー
    メロメロ ハッシュタグレベル4以上
    ウィンク
    チュッチュ

    ﾛｸﾞｲﾝはもう慣れっこ 業績「[デイリーギフト]ログインはもう慣れっこ」達成

    探検家 以下の3つの地域探索の内1つ以上を達成。
    ﾒｲﾌﾟﾙﾜｰﾙﾄﾞの メイプルワールドの1地域以上で地域探索業績を達成
    ｸﾞﾗﾝﾃﾞｨｽの グランディスの1地域以上で地域探索業績を達成
    ｱｰｹｲﾝﾘﾊﾞｰの アーケインリバーの1地域以上で地域探索業績を達成
    極めろ!ｸﾞﾙｸｴ 業績「[グループクエスト] 極めろ！グルクエ」達成
    ｴﾘｰﾄﾎﾞｽ出現ﾌﾗｸﾞ 業績「[エリートボス] ちょっと特別なやつをたくさん退治」達成
    感性 業績「[感性] 今日はクレセント」達成
    魅力 業績「[魅力] 見れば見るほど魅力的」達成
    器用さ 業績「[器用さ] 多才だね」達成
    意志 業績「[意志] 固い意志」達成
    ｶﾘｽﾏ 業績「[カリスマ] 私を見る視線が違う」達成
    洞察力 業績「[洞察力] 君の本心が丸見え」達成
    性向六角形 上記の性向業績6つ全てを達成
    駆け出し薬草ﾊﾝﾀｰ 業績「[薬草採集] 駆け出し薬草ハンター」達成
    中級薬草ﾊﾝﾀｰ 業績「[薬草採集] 中級薬草ハンター」達成
    熟練した薬草ﾊﾝﾀｰ 業績「[薬草採集] 熟練した薬草ハンター」達成
    駆け出し鉱夫 業績「[採鉱] 駆け出し鉱夫」達成
    中級鉱夫 業績「[採鉱] 中級鉱夫」達成
    熟練した鉱夫 業績「[採鉱] 熟練した鉱夫」達成
    ｱｰｹｲﾝｼﾝﾎﾞﾙ 業績「[アーケインシンボル] 眩しいですね」達成
    ｼﾞｪﾑｽﾄｰﾝｺﾚｸﾀｰ 業績「[コアジェムストーン] い、し、こ、ろ」達成
    ﾓﾝｽﾀｰﾊﾟｰｸﾊﾞｯｼﾞ獲得 業績「[モンスターパーク] The Chosen One」達成
    20星強化成功 業績「[スターフォース] 星が20個！」達成
    21星強化成功 業績「[スターフォース] 星が21個！」達成
    22星強化成功 業績「[スターフォース] 星が22個！」達成
    23星強化成功 業績「[スターフォース] 星が23個！」達成
    24星強化成功 業績「[スターフォース] 星が24個！」達成

    スペシャルパーツ

    「スペシャルハッシュポイント」を以下の「スペシャルパーツ」と交換できます。
    各項目をクリックすると内容が展開されます。

    フレーム
    名称 フレーム 必要ポイント数
    雲のフレーム：ハート(桃) 10
    雲のフレーム：空薬 10
    雲のフレーム：チェック(黄) 10
    雲のフレーム：紫 10
    雲のフレーム：ミント 10
    ティルノグフレーム 15
    ラウンフレーム 15

    スタンプ スタンプはフレーム上に配置できます。
    名称 スタンプ 必要ポイント数
    エクストリーム成長の秘薬 1
    極限成長の秘薬 1
    超越成長の秘薬 1
    ソルエルダの欠片 1
    ソルエルダ 1
    財物獲得の秘薬 1
    経験蓄積の秘薬 1
    魔力が宿った眼帯 1
    ルージュコントロールマシンマーク 1
    夢幻のベルト 1
    凄まじい恐怖 1
    コマンダーフォースイヤリング 1
    苦痛の根源 1
    創世のバッジ 1
    次元のゼンマイ 1
    半透明シャボン玉スタンプ 3
    半透明リボンスタンプ 3
    半透明星スタンプ 3
    半透明ハートスタンプ 3
    半透明蝶スタンプ 3
    ※スタンプはフレームが付いている場合のみ設定可能です。(フレームを外すとスタンプも全て外されます。)
    ※フレーム上の決められた位置に1個ずつ配置できます。
    ※同じ種類のスタンプを複数個同時に配置できます。

    ハッシュタグカラー ハッシュタグの文字色を設定できます。
    名称 色 ハッシュタグカラー表示例 必要ポイント数
    赤 #MAPLESTORY 1
    オレンジ #MAPLESTORY 1
    黄色 #MAPLESTORY 1
    緑 #MAPLESTORY 1
    青 #MAPLESTORY 1
    水色 #MAPLESTORY 1
    紫 #MAPLESTORY 1
    ミントカラー #MAPLESTORY 1
    ピンク #MAPLESTORY 1
    薄紫 #MAPLESTORY 1
    紅葉 #MAPLESTORY 3

    BGM 椅子使用時に再生するBGMを設定できます。
    名称 ゲーム内のBGM使用箇所 必要ポイント数
    Temple of Time マップ「時間の神殿」 10
    Ereve: Raindrop Flower マップ「エレヴ」 10
    Resting Place of God マップ「神獣の休憩所」 10
    Ereve: Queen's Garden マップ「シグナスの庭園」 10
    Ludibrium: Flying in a Blue Dream ルディブリアム行きの船 10
    Henesys: Rest N Peace ヘネシスの狩り場マップ 10
    Sunset over the Horizon イベント「次元の訪問者」関連マップ 10
    Missing You エリニアの木のダンジョン 10
    Where Stars Rest マップ「平和な潜水艇」 10
    Adventure Island 旧イベント「アドベンチャーアイランド」 15
    MapleGalaxy2 15周年イベント「フローズンリンク」 15
    Title 旧ログイン画面 15
    Momijigaoka 職業「カンナ」「ハヤト」関連マップ 15
    Our Story Goes On 職業「リン」関連マップ 15
    ※BGMは他のプレイヤーには再生されません。

    動く絵文字
    名称 絵文字 必要ポイント数
    小さな星 3
    メル 3
    応援 3
    ウォンウオォン 3
    夢の蝶 5

    ダイナミックハッシュタグ ダイナミックハッシュタグは、椅子に座るたびに文字が変わるハッシュタグです。
    名称 以下の単語から
    ランダムで1つ表示    		 表示例 必要ポイント数

    注意事項
    ※イベントで、ワールド内で共有される情報、ボス討伐情報などが使われる場合、ワールドリープでは進行中の状態が受け継がれないため、ワールドリープ後に正常にイベント進行できない場合があります。
    ※メンテナンスによって開催期間が変更になる可能性があります。

    一覧へ戻る


    台服冒险岛公告


    【月光水晶】


    注意事項：

    1.此為機會中獎商品，消費者購買或參與活動不代表即可獲得特定商品，詳細內容請參考【機率型道具說明】。

    2.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    3.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    4.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    【情人節隨機箱】


    注意事項：

    1.此為機會中獎商品，消費者購買或參與活動不代表即可獲得特定商品，詳細內容請參考【機率型道具說明】。

    2.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    3.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    4.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    【情人節特賣】


    注意事項：

    1.此為機會中獎商品，消費者購買或參與活動不代表即可獲得特定商品，詳細內容請參考【機率型道具說明】。

    2.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    3.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    4.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    新楓之谷《0212(三) Chaser例行維護開機公告》


    親愛的冒險者們：

    今日02/12(三) 的維護作業已完成，全伺服器已於下午14:00開放。

    距離V268改版倒數一周，記得把握活動進度換獎勵唷。

    而V268的新副本-紅月之森，將在02/14晚上8點在官方YT進行改版直播。

     

    一、活動內容

     

    【記憶中的一頁】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18 (二)23:59

    本次V267版本的主要活動，

    上線簽到、狩獵怪物簽到，還有小遊戲、拳擊機。

    可獲得各種獎勵道具，一定要玩好玩滿。

     

    【CHASER】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/03/31 (一)23:59

    是V267~V268為期2個版本的大活動，跟著殺人鯨調查。

    有核心調查、特殊調查、深入調查，

    達成指定條件，獲得限定時裝、殺人鯨禮物、殺人鯨背景。

     

    【究極燃燒1+4 & 花開月影-究極燃燒1+2】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    全職業可燃燒到260的究極燃燒1+4。

    還有<狂狼/隱月>限定的花開月影-究極燃燒1+2。

    活動時間到05/13，可以慢慢練。

     

    【花開月影祕笈】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    狂狼勇士和隱月迎來Remaster，只有這2個職業才能參加的活動。

    狂狼勇士是花之卷軸，隱月是月之卷軸，

    達成指定等級，獲得豐富獎勵。

     

    【Double菇菇通行證】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    不管新創角色還是老手，全職業都可進行，

    多了挑戰任務，打敗指定BOSS，就可獲得不錯用的裝備。

    帳號限定參加1次，沒辦法換角色，千萬要想好用哪隻角色在參加，

     

    【新BOSS - 林波，根源的暴走】

    活動時間：2025/02/05(三)維護後 ~ 2025/03/31 (一)23:59

    Lv285的新BOSS-林波，最多限定3人組隊攻略。

    活動分3種方式進行：

    1)無關難度擊敗林波。

    2)困難難度擊敗林波。

    3)若有玩家擊敗困難林波，其他玩家可以獲得一同慶祝的獎勵。

     

    【泰里的20週年禮物】

    活動時間：2025/01/20(一)00:00 ~ 2025/12/20 (六)23:59

    2025年是楓之谷在台的20周年，

    而在每月的20號，可和泰里獲得獎勵，

    千萬千萬要記得在20號領獎勵呀。

     

    【燃燒特快車】

    活動時間：2025/01/22(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18 (二)23:59

    狩獵怪物進行簽到，

    有EXP券、249水可以拿，要輕鬆練分身要記得拿好拿滿。

     

    【週六甜蜜時刻】

    V267版本的每周六，左邊禮物盒領好康。

    必須是01/24 23:59前創立的角色。

    日期

    道具名稱

    數量

    2025/1/25

    00:00~23:59

    心動滿滿寵物箱

    1

    2025年撲通撲通紅包

    5

    二、商城更新

     

    【情人節特賣】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/02/12(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59
    有關情人的時裝，復刻販售。

    限時1周推出。

     

    【情人節隨機箱】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/02/12(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/26(三)07:59
    新的隨機箱，可以抽到時裝、椅子、字型....等等。

    抽到的時裝可以染色。

     

    【月光水晶&寵物剪刀】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/02/12(三)維護後 ~ 2025/03/12(三)07:59
    月光水晶的P寵=弗洛裡安、佛羅倫斯、小佛羅拉。

    而寵物剪刀限時上架，直購210元。

     

    【黃金蘋果 – 凝聚的戒指＆露希妲耳環】

    販售時間：2025/02/05(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59
    凝聚戒指和露希妲耳環，

    蘋果椅子<不朽的循環>、字型<老舊的羊皮紙(Unit)>。

    還有v267~v268限定推出的AUT6區交換券，40個碎片換60個AUT。

     

    【時尚隨機箱 – 火焰狐狸＆春日遊樂園＆神之次元】

    販售時間：2025/02/05(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59

    紅黑色與火焰主題的火焰狐狸時裝。

    藍色黃色為主的春日遊樂園時裝。

    還有神之次元的時裝。

     

    【皇家美容美髮 – 沉穩珊瑚＆銀河＆冷酷反派臉型】

    販售時間：2025/02/05(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59
    比克‧艾德華為新楓之谷的民眾帶來超人氣的髮型和臉型！！

    沉穩珊瑚＆銀河＆冷酷反派臉型登場，走過路過千萬不要錯過！！

     

    【萌獸卡牌包 – 卡爾西溫&小蘭&瑪哈】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59
    除了卡爾西溫的怪物們，

    還有小蘭、瑪哈。

    殺人鯨特殊萌獸依舊還在裡面。

     

    【寵物隨機箱 – 記錄的寵物們】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59

    記錄魔法圖書、記錄古老圖書、記錄羊皮紙，

    他們都是W寵。


     

    三、遊戲說明

    1. 官方人員不會透過遊戲內來與玩家通知中獎訊息，更不會於官網主動要求玩家輸入帳號密碼，請各位玩家不要前往來路不明的網址，以免帳號陷入盜客的風險中，bf帳號務必要綁定bf!APP並設定最高防護，才能獲得完善的防盜保護。

    2. 請勿購買來路不明的點數以及商城道具，保障自身權益。

    3. 楓幣商城、拍賣場、現金道具交換、宅配功能必須要創建超過3天且等級達到61等級以上才可使用；商城送禮則是需要創建超過7天和等級61等以上。

    4. 常態維持艾麗亞伺服器限制創角，若艾麗亞伺服器沒有任何一隻角色，將會被限制新創角色。(但可以透過移民移入艾麗亞來解除限制)

    5. 01/08&01/12的伺服器回溯的處理進度說明：於01/29例行維護，針對客訴裝備回溯的玩家，補償應有的素質裝備。其中解放創世武器剛好被回溯的案件，會配發解放好的22星創世武器，並回收尚未解放的創世武器，以及恢復應有的創世任務進度。請留意禮物盒或宅配。

    6. TGS獲獎的紀念獎勵，置獎時間：01/29 維護後 ~ 02/25 23:59止。(必須是01/28 23:59 前創立的角色)

    7. 每日登入送好禮，置獎時間：02/12 維護後 ~ 02/18 23:59止。(必須是02/11 23:59 前創立的角色)


     

    四、已知問題

    1. 在聖克梅勒茲進行貿易時，怪物會異常生成在船下方(圖層後)的問題。

    2. BOSS<森蘭丸>的等待地圖，無法使用BOSS傳送的問題。

     

     

    五、修正問題

    1. 少部分玩家，未能領取01/16~01/22的師徒排名獎勵，於02/12例行維護補償，左邊禮物盒領取。

    2. 開拓者技能<附加爆破>未正常造成傷害的問題。

    3. 同時持有<永恆超級順移石、高級服務票券>，導致順移石未能正常運作的問題。

    4. 道具<恢復附加方塊>的背包擺放位置，導致無法按再使用一次按鈕的問題。

     

    【新楓之谷台灣官方IG】

    【新楓之谷台灣官方粉絲團FB】

    【QR Code登入beanfun!超便利】

    【遊戲帳號24小時貼身防護】

    【點數紅利虛寶零用金免費拿】

    beanfun! 下載

     

    敬祝各位冒險者們遊戲愉快~
    《新楓之谷》工作小組 敬上

    【維護】2025/02/17(一) 遊戲橘子服務網頁維護通知


    最新消息

    【維護】2025/02/17(一) 遊戲橘子服務網頁維護通知

    2025-02-12

    親愛的玩家 您好，

     

    為提升更好的服務品質，遊戲橘子將於 2025/02/17(一) 14:00 - 15:00 進行活動網頁維護，作業期間網頁將無法連線，還請玩家待5 - 10分鐘後再重新整理頁面使用即可。

     

    維護影響範圍如下：

    　● 遊戲橘子官網活動頁面。

    　● 遊戲橘子代理遊戲官網活動頁面。

    * 活動頁面為網址帶有 gama-Event 的網頁。

     

    造成不便還請見諒。



    遊戲橘子客服中心　敬啟
